title: Ready Multi-Purpose And S[acious PEB (Pre-Engineered Building Industrial Shed at Bhumi World Industrial Park Bhiwandi, Thane
content: Multi-Purpose And Spacious PEB (Pre-Engineered Building Industrial Shed at Bhumi World Industrial Park Bhiwandi, Thane #Ready #RCC #STRUCTURE #INDUSTRIAL #SPACE AT #Bhumi #World #Industrial #Park #Bhiwandi #Thane 2018 #Project #Details - #Bhumi #World #Industrial #park, #Bhiwandi - 40% #Subsidy for f#actory #Gala for #rent in #Bhiwandi, #Godown, #godown in #Bhiwandi, #Industrial #Factory, #Industrial #property, #Industrial #Shed, #Industrial #shed on #rent, #Industrial #Unit, #Logistic, #PEB #WAREHOUSE, #Warehouse in #India, #Warehousing, #bhiwandi #godown #rates, #gala in #bhiwandi, #industrial #gala for #rent in #bhiwandi, industrial gala for sale in bhiwandi, industrial shed for sale in bhiwandi, warehouse in bhiwandi for rent, #Industrial #shed with 40% #Subsidy at #Bhiwandi Already Successfully Running Companies in Bhumi World Industrial Park #AshokLeyland #ShapoorjiPalonji #Mufti #DTechnology #GlobalPackaging #FirstChoice #Rybcal #Vivaanflexipack #Orbitalmekatronik #fristrain ##bajaoo #Eparisaraa #esppliersindia #KPCE #PNDPlastic Bhumi World Industrial Park is well designed as per International Standards, It’s one of themost unique Industrial park and commercial offices. We also have retails mall well equipped with all the modern amenities and one of the best infrastructure needed for today’s Industries.  Invest in RCC Structure-Industrial Units/Sheds in Bhiwandi by the most reputed developers BHUMI WORLD.  RCC Structure-Industrial Units/Sheds Rcc ground +2 structure Ground- 3000 sqft area with 16ft height (Width - 24 ft and Length - 100 ft) First floor- 3000 sqft area with 12 ft height (Width - 24 ft and Length - 100 ft) Second floor- 3000 sqft and 1350 sqft with 12 ft height (Width - 24 ft and Length - 100 ft)  Shed Structure - Area 4688 sqft with 20ft wall and centre height of 25ft  We do have areas in RCC building and Shed Building in the range of 800 sqft to 1700 sqft for small industries and offices and Packing Industries  And Also Built to suit Option from 5000 sqft to 15,000 sqft     Special features of the Project:  1. Octroi / LBT free area  2. Ready possession/ Under Construction available.  3. Bank Loan Approved.  4. 24/ 7 electricity and water.  5. Located on Mumbai-Nasik Highway. Just 9 kms from Thane(Majiwada) and & 7 Kms from Kalyan station.  6. Ground+2 structure. Ground Floor 16ft and 1st/2nd floor 12ft Height.  7. Industrial & Commercial space.  Over 600 units sold and 230 factories operational some of the Industries who have started the factories or have bought the units with us.  1) Printing: (Printers, Binders, Punch makers, CTP, Paper Supplier, Ink Supplier, Machinery Supplier, Etc)  2) Plastic: (Injection Mounding, Machinery Supplier, Mould Maker, Raw material Supplier, Etc)  3) Garments: (Fabric Supplier, Machinery Supplier, Shirts manufacturer, Pants Manufacturer, Kids garments, Ladies Garments, and many more)  3) Imitation Jeweler.  4) Furniture Manufacturer.  5) Engineering: Fabricator, and all types of SSI in engineering industry.  6) Water Purifier Manufacturer.  7) Food: Namkeen, Bread, Biscuits, Dry Fruits.  8) Cosmetics.  9) Car accessories maker.  10) Electronics: electric panels, TV screen, Induction cookers, etc.  Requesting your appointment for detailed discussion on Industrial Units and Subsidy  Contact us for the site visit or for further assistance. For Site Visit or Inspection : Please Note :- Require atleast 4-6hrs. NoticeCall / #Message / #Email / #Whatsapp for Inspection! Specialist in Warehouse Property Bhiwandi Property Ajmeria Property RERA No.A51700003226 Specialist In Commercial Properties We are located in Bhiwandi, Near Mumbai! For An Appointment Please Contact : www.ajmeria.com Ajmeria Property On 9960601613 / 9321620919
